text: 4. Group consisting of nickel cobalt precursor of the lithium manganate high nickel type according to claim 1 or 2, characterized in, high nickel type tap density of the precursor of the lithium manganate ≥ 2. 0 g/cm-nickel-cobalt3, specific surface area of 9-12 m2/g,loose 1.7-2.0 g/cm-density3, S≤ 0.18% content.
